thread.title: Dude makes dating resume and immediately becomes internet sensation (12 Photos)
thread.title_full: Dude makes dating resume and immediately becomes internet sensation (12 Photos)

author: Dustin
title: Dude makes dating resume and immediately becomes internet sensation (12 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
The dating scene is like a carnival ride at the zoo. It’s a rollercoaster of highs and lows surrounded by wild animals. If you’re woman and you’re lucky, at least you get a free meal out of it before the clown car drops you off at home. 2 
What the dating world really needs is a little more professionalism. Enter Joey Adams. This whiz kid and Michigan State student created a dating resume, complete with infographics and pie charts. When he came across the following Facebook post where Ashley Harrington was requesting a formal date for her roommate, he knew he had found the perfect moment to highlight his personal strengths and experiences. 3 
Flaming Hot Cheetos? She just went from a ? to a 10. 4 
This honestly looks better than the dumpster fire I call a resume. 
Something tells me this guy is about to need a much more robust “experience” section: 5 
I mean, the guy was a lubricant consultant! Of course that’s what you lead with! Advertisement Advertisement 6 
Need to work on those roller blade skills, but that “replying to long texts” slider is some serious game. 7 
How does he have this much time? Does this dude sleep? 
Apparently ‘Cheetos girl’ went with someone else (and probably had a craptastic time). But that didn’t stop the interwebs from turning Joey into Twitter’s most eligible bachelor. 8
